Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>org.openclover</groupId>
  <artifactId>clover-maven-plugin</artifactId>
  <version>4.3.0</version>
  <type>maven-plugin</type>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'org.openclover:clover-maven-plugin:maven-plugin:4.3.0'

Apache Ivy

<dependency org="org.openclover" name="clover-maven-plugin" rev="4.3.0">
  <artifact name="clover-maven-plugin" type="maven-plugin" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='org.openclover', module='clover-maven-plugin', version='4.3.0')
)

Gradle/Grails

compile 'org.openclover:clover-maven-plugin:4.3.0'

Scala SBT

libraryDependencies += "org.openclover" % "clover-maven-plugin" % "4.3.0"

Leiningen

[org.openclover/clover-maven-plugin "4.3.0"]
